channel.title: Bought a vps, and a domain. need help getting the rsps up
channel.description: ok so i bought a domain and a windows vps. i just need to know how to run this. do i need to upload files to the domain? like literally don't know anyhting to get this up.

item.title: Bought a vps, and a domain. need help getting the rsps up
item.dc:creator: @Andy1993 Andy1993
item.description:
@Andy1993 wrote:

If you add me on Skype, I will guide you through it , and make it easy for you to understand/learn.

Read full topic
item.source: Bought a vps, and a domain. need help getting the rsps up

item.title: Bought a vps, and a domain. need help getting the rsps up
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

You connect to the windows vps through remote desktop connection with the login details the company gives you. Then when connected download no-ip- login with your details, download java again the most up to date. Then transfer your files to dropbox or mediafire, download them on the windows vps. The domain would be for a website which if you have the software and html coding etc… go for it.

Read full topic
item.source: Bought a vps, and a domain. need help getting the rsps up

item.title: Bought a vps, and a domain. need help getting the rsps up
item.dc:creator: @menospy menospy
item.description:
@menospy wrote:

Learning how to do this could take you a while, shouldn’t have payed for a VPS & domain if you don’t know what to do yet.

Read full topic
item.source: Bought a vps, and a domain. need help getting the rsps up

item.title: Bought a vps, and a domain. need help getting the rsps up
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I’m assuming the VPS is for the server, and the domain is with the webhosting plan (having HostGator for example). You use whatever software that you want to use (vbulletin, Mybb, SMF etc.) and upload the files to the cPanel or FTP.

Read full topic
